import asyncio

async def async_bytearray_to_list(byte_array):
    """Convert bytearray to list asynchronously."""
    await asyncio.sleep(0)  # Simulate async I/O operation
    return list(byte_array)

def main():
    # Example bytearray
    byte_array = bytearray(b'\x00\x01\x02\x03\x04')

    # Run the async function and get the result
    loop = asyncio.get_event_loop()
    list_from_bytearray = loop.run_until_complete(async_bytearray_to_list(byte_array))
    loop.close()

    # Print the result
    print(list_from_bytearray)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
